PageWidgetPortable.Title: Planilhas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_Z_PLANILHAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(0=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Z_PLANILHAUSUARIOS WHERE PLANILHA = A.HANDLE)) OR (A.HANDLE IN (SELECT PLANILHA FROM Z_PLANILHAUSUARIOS WHERE USUARIO = @USUARIO))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1569_at1809_hsd668ac5f.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
